info.title: Star Wars API Platform
info.description: A REST API for exploring the Star Wars universe with advanced filtering, sorting, and correlated queries.

get.description: Health check endpoint for load balancers and monitoring.
Readiness check - can the service handle requests.

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Health Ready Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all Star Wars characters with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Field to sort by (name, height, mass)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Field to sort by (name, height, mass)

get.description: Search for characters by name.

schema.title: Response Search People Api V1 People Search Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific character.
Get all films that a character appears in.

schema.title: Response Get Person Films Api V1 People  Person Id  Films Get

get.description: Get all starships piloted by a character.

schema.title: Response Get Person Starships Api V1 People  Person Id  Starships Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all Star Wars films.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Field to sort by (title, episode_id, release_date)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Field to sort by (title, episode_id, release_date)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific film.
Get all characters that appear in a film.

schema.title: Response Get Film Characters Api V1 Films  Film Id  Characters Get

get.description: Get all planets that appear in a film.

schema.title: Response Get Film Planets Api V1 Films  Film Id  Planets Get

get.description: Get all starships that appear in a film.

schema.title: Response Get Film Starships Api V1 Films  Film Id  Starships Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all starships with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Field to sort by (name, length, cost_in_credits, hyperdrive_rating)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Field to sort by (name, length, cost_in_credits, hyperdrive_rating)

get.description: Search for starships by name or model.

schema.title: Response Search Starships Api V1 Starships Search Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific starship.
Get all pilots who have piloted this starship.

schema.title: Response Get Starship Pilots Api V1 Starships  Starship Id  Pilots Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all planets with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Field to sort by (name, diameter, population)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Field to sort by (name, diameter, population)

get.description: Search for planets by name.

schema.title: Response Search Planets Api V1 Planets Search Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific planet.
Get all characters who live on this planet.

schema.title: Response Get Planet Residents Api V1 Planets  Planet Id  Residents Get

get.description: Get all films that feature this planet.

schema.title: Response Get Planet Films Api V1 Planets  Planet Id  Films Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all vehicles.
Get detailed information about a specific vehicle.
Get all pilots who have piloted this vehicle.

schema.title: Response Get Vehicle Pilots Api V1 Vehicles  Vehicle Id  Pilots Get

get.description: Get a paginated list of all species.
Get detailed information about a specific species.
Get all characters of this species.

schema.title: Response Get Species People Api V1 Species  Species Id  People Get

get.description: Get general statistics about the Star Wars universe.
Get statistics about Star Wars films.
Get demographics and statistics about characters.
Get statistics about planets.
Compare multiple characters side by side.
Compare multiple starships side by side.
Compare multiple planets side by side.
Root endpoint with API information.
